title: スレッドの全てのメールを同時に開きたい
creator: t.saito.sugawara
content:
以前のサンダーバードでは出来ていた物と思いますが、 送信済トレイと受信トレイの同じスレッドの物全てを同時に開きたいのですが、どうすれば良いか教えてください。

IN ENGLISH I think this was possible in previous versions of Thunderbird, but I would like to open all items in the same thread in my Sent and Inbox at the same time. Can you tell me how to do this?

title: folder filter problem
creator: billboyd09
content:
the problem is that when I receive an email it goes straight to delete folder there is no where I can set the filters to filter of my choosing, I have lost losing all in coming mails I am talking with telstra as one page said it is an IMAP problem in that it just removes emails for no reason but in your problems page it says I can change the filter settings but in the settings there is no place to change filter rules 

I am getting very frustrated  after 6 hours and not getting anywhere  I have uninstall Thunderbird and reinstalled  but nothing changed  running win 11os  on desktop

what do you suggest

title: Cannot snooze or delete calendar reminders
creator: tb22
content: I use the Thunderbird calendar in version 147.0.1. The calendar syncs with CalDav and works great. Although when the reminder pop-up appears i am not able to snooze (postpone) an event or delete na event. Nothing happens and the reminder keeps popping up every 5 minutes (as in the settings) untill the event has passed. Even worse, when i enable show missed missed events, i cannot even delete the old events in the list.

title: Thunderbird 147 release install gives error "XML-parsefout: ongedefinieerde entiteit"
creator: hans.bollen
content:
Hallo Mozilla Thunderbird support

I was executing this manual : https://support.mozilla.org/nl/kb/thunderbird-installeren-linux#w_thunderbird-handmatig-installeren-voor-een-specifiek-releasekanaal-voor-gevorderde-gebruikers.

Reason : I have installed Linux Mint 22.3 Cinnamon which came with Thunderbird 140 ers. My mail has been transferred from a computer (with problems), which used ? a younger ? version !?

I use Thunderbird for many years, with profile manager and 6 profiles in it. At the moment I cannot work with my mail. Which is bad for me ... >:-|

Starting thunderbird with thunderbird -P "You have launched an older version of Thunderbird" A newer version of Thunderbird may have made changes to your profile which are no longer compatible with this older version. Use this profile only with that newer version, or create a new profile for this installation of Thunderbird. Creating a new profile requires setting up your accounts, calendars and add-ons again.

I did worked al those instructions, which went good.

Almost done

I dont get the launcher on the desktop

Most important is this error popping up in a yellow box

This is the error XML-parsefout: ongedefinieerde entiteit Locatie: chrome://messenger/content/messenger.xhtml Regelnummer 48, kolom 1:

Please help

Thanks in advance

Hans Bollen hans.bollen@linuxzob.nl

https://www.linuxzob.nl/wiki https://www.linuxzob.nl/wiki/doku.php?id=linux_internet:thunderbird#thunderbird_mail_-_verjongen
